attributes.action: Make it illegal for chemists/pharmacists to be able to refuse the sale of items because it is against their choosen religion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A pharmacist refused to sell someone an item because it disagreed with the religion they had choosen.
Nobody should be able to do this and the law needs to be changed.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
